segments.text: Hey , there's Leo . I wonder why he's walking arm in arm with that young woman .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's as plain as the nose on your face . They're dating each other .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're pulling my leg ! She must be thirty years younger than Leo . Talk about robbing the cradle !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , you can bet this relationship's going to be a flash in the pan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It must have been love at first sight because I know he didn't have a girlfriend last week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think you are absolutely right . Actually , my father proposed to my mother after knowing her only two weeks . They got married a month later .
segments.speaker: S2
